    29	class HierarchyTransformerLoss(torch.nn.Module):
    30	    """Hyperbolic loss that linearly combines hperbolic clustering loss and hyperbolic Centripetal loss and applies weights for joint optimisation."""
    31	
    32	    def __init__(
    33	        self,
    34	        model: HierarchyTransformer,
    35	        clustering_loss_weight: float = 1.0,
    36	        clustering_loss_margin: float = 5.0,
    37	        centripetal_loss_weight: float = 1.0,
    38	        centripetal_loss_margin: float = 0.5,
    39	    ):
    40	        super().__init__()
    41	
    42	        self.model = model
    43	        self.manifold = self.model.manifold
    44	        self.cluster_weight = clustering_loss_weight
    45	        self.centri_weight = centripetal_loss_weight
    46	        self.cluster_loss_margin = clustering_loss_margin
    47	        self.centri_loss_margin = centripetal_loss_margin
    48	
    49	    def forward(self, sentence_features: Iterable[dict[str, torch.Tensor]], labels: torch.Tensor):
    50	        """Forward propagation that follows [`sentence_transformers.losses`](https://github.com/UKPLab/sentence-transformers/tree/master/sentence_transformers/losses)."""
    51	        reps = [self.model(sentence_feature)["sentence_embedding"] for sentence_feature in sentence_features]
    52	        assert len(reps) == 3
    53	        rep_anchor, rep_positive, rep_negative = reps
    54
